text: ugh i know i asked this just a couple months ago, and i can’t find where and what the answer is!

Hey Michelle - currently cloning modules down to the child theme isn't possible, there's a few weird technical complexities we still need to figure out with modules to enable this, but hoping to have it enabled soon
Here is <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/design-manager/swap-and-edit-your-blog-email-or-page-template|more information >specific to the template swap tool.
